data.name: FreeStyleFootball - Card Pack (WF)
data.detailed_description:
WF Position Card Pack

Position card pack is composed of 3 B grade card packs.
3 card packs are composed of the stats that are most useful for the position.

The following card packs are included in WF card pack:
Run / Stamina / Dribbling Speed


How To Use
DLC items will be sent to your mailbox when purchased.
DLC item belongs to the character who received the item.
After receiving position card pack from the mailbox, you can open it at item locker.
You may obtain 3 different card packs when using position card pack.
If you draw a card from card packs, you can check at card menu on the left.

English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window XP
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
